visionSection.title: HITEK'S VISION
visionSection.mainStatement: Hitek's long-term goal is to become a leading software company in the World
visionSection.description: Hitek Software continuously strives to research technology every day to achieve the goal of becoming a leading software company in the World.

messageSection.title: CHAIRMAN'S MESSAGE
messageSection.mainGoal: HITEK'S LONG-TERM GOAL IS TO BECOME A WORLD-LEADING SOFTWARE COMPANY
paragraphs: Fortunately having the opportunity to work with many customers worldwide during the startup phase, I have accumulated extensive experience to understand customer needs in each country and each field they target.
I am building Hitek Software stronger every day with that experience.

Hitek Software is a collection of young, enthusiastic energy, always ready to explore and adapt to new technologies. Therefore, we are confident that with the strength of quickly updating new technologies and knowledge, we will satisfy the needs of Hitek's customers.

In addition to young human resources, we also have consulting staff who are fluent in foreign languages and have deep expertise in technology, which will eliminate language barriers between Hitek and foreign customers. This is also the formula that has helped Hitek Software approach and accompany many customers worldwide for over 5 years.

image.alt: Hitek Software Chairman - Tran Anh Khoi

messageSection.quote: Continuously innovate, continuously develop - Leading the passionate young team to reach global standards

us.title: About Us

description.text1: Discover the journey from a startup with 5 engineers to a global technology company
description.highlight: with the mission to become a world-leading software partner

introTexts: Hitek was established in 2018, a long enough journey for us to affirm our position in the current technology market.
Hitek's future goal is not only to be the best software development company in Vietnam, but also to be a world-leading software company!

items.title: Hitek Founded
items.description: Hitek was established with only 5 software engineers, working freelance, focusing on web and mobile application development for the Vietnamese market.

items.title: Going Global
items.description: First receiving software outsourcing contracts for the Korean market, Hitek changed business strategy to expand to foreign markets.

items.title: Korea Specialization
items.description: We continued to develop technology in Korea. Nearly 90% of projects came from this market.

items.title: Globalization
items.description: Hitek provides software outsourcing services and software products for customers from USA, Canada, Germany, Korea, Australia, Japan.

mission.title: Next Mission
mission.description: Continue expanding to new markets, enhancing AI and advanced technology research, continuously improving service quality to become a reliable technology partner globally.

header.title: HITEK SOFTWARE IMPLEMENTS CSR
header.description: CSR stands for Corporate Social Responsibility, which is considered a popular global trend, becoming a 'soft' requirement for businesses. To fulfill the obligations that a business and related individuals must perform for society to achieve the most positive impacts and minimize negative impacts on society. Hitek Software has been implementing the following items:

items.title: First
items.subtitle: Economic
items.description: Includes satisfying social needs, increasing social welfare, ensuring business survival and development.

items.title: Second
items.subtitle: Legal
items.description: Businesses must fully implement legal regulations for stakeholders, including shareholders, consumers, employees' families.

items.title: Third
items.subtitle: Ethical
items.description: Behaviors and activities that society expects from businesses, but are not regulated in the legal system.

items.title: Fourth
items.subtitle: Humanitarian
items.description: Businesses need to perform behaviors showing desire to contribute to community and society.

footer.title: Sustainable development commitment
footer.description: Hitek Software continuously strives to implement social responsibility in all business activities, aiming for sustainable development and positive contributions to the community.

header.title: Sustainable Development Goals
paragraphs: Hitek Software has been establishing a global operational network, therefore we always focus on work quality at every step and stage.
Hitek's leadership also greatly cares about employees' lives, so we aim for appropriate goals within the 17 Sustainable Development Goals.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Hitek Software believes that we will help improve quality of life, and we will continue to strive to realize a new modern society, smarter and happier.

goals.title: Quality Education
goals.description: Ensure quality, inclusive and equitable education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all.
goals.hitekAction: Hitek Software regularly organizes training sessions for employees on programming knowledge, along with necessary soft skills for everyone during work.

goals.title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
goals.description: To achieve economic performance at a high level, always improve and innovate technology, including focusing on high value-added and labor-intensive areas.
goals.hitekAction: Promote development-oriented policies to support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation.

goals.title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
goals.description: Create new technologies, focus on developing employees' most creative ideas.
goals.hitekAction: Always create conditions for employees to work in an environment with the best quality infrastructure facilities.

globalImpact.title: Global Impact
globalImpact.description: Through implementing sustainable development goals, Hitek Software not only contributes to the local community but also creates positive impacts on a global scale.

servicesList.title: Custom software services
servicesList.description: As a leading custom software development company in Vietnam, we have successfully completed hundreds of projects for customers worldwide.
servicesList.fullDescription: Established in 2017, Hitek always proficiently applies new methods. We provide customized software solutions suitable for specific business needs of each customer. With an experienced team of engineers, we commit to delivering high-quality products meeting the most stringent requirements.
features: Custom software development according to specific requirements

servicesList.title: Long-term software development services
servicesList.description: Long-term software development is a complex building process requiring deep knowledge and experience.
servicesList.fullDescription: Not everyone is formally trained and has deep knowledge to handle long-term software development projects themselves. We provide a team of experts committed long-term, accompanying businesses throughout the development and operation process.

servicesList.title: Web development services
servicesList.description: Nearly 10 years of experience in the industry, we always develop web using the most outstanding technologies.
servicesList.fullDescription: We use modern front-end technologies (Angular, ReactJS, Jquery, HTML5, CSS3...) combined with powerful backend frameworks to create high-quality web applications. From corporate introduction websites to complex web application systems.

servicesList.title: Cloud Migration services
servicesList.description: Leverage cloud and infrastructure to drive business growth.
servicesList.fullDescription: We help businesses migrate systems to cloud safely and efficiently, optimizing costs and enhancing scalability. Services include consulting, planning, implementation and system operation on cloud platforms.

servicesList.title: Mobile app development services
servicesList.description: As a leading mobile application development company, we have many years of experience in creating innovative applications.
servicesList.fullDescription: We develop mobile applications for both iOS and Android, ensuring the best user experience and optimal performance. From idea to complete product, we accompany you at every step.

servicesList.title: Software testing services
servicesList.description: As one of the leading software development companies in Vietnam, Hitek excels in quality testing.
servicesList.fullDescription: Our professional QA/QC team ensures product quality through rigorous testing processes and automation. We provide comprehensive testing services from unit, integration to system testing.

servicesList.title: Project-based outsourcing services
servicesList.description: Having and continuing to have opportunities to implement Outsourcing projects for developed countries worldwide.
servicesList.fullDescription: With experience handling the most complex projects for US, Canada, Korea,... markets, we confidently deliver quality outsourcing solutions. Our team of experts is ready to participate in all project phases.

servicesList.title: Offshore center building services
servicesList.description: Accumulated experience from offshore center building projects with customers from around the world.
servicesList.fullDescription: Hitek confidently believes we are one of the few providers of the most suitable and modern offshore center building services. We provide comprehensive solutions from infrastructure setup to team recruitment and management.

servicesList.title: Software development in neighboring countries
servicesList.description: Software development in countries close to target markets and usually having similar time zones.
servicesList.fullDescription: Differences will always be minimal when you choose software development in neighboring countries with Hitek's team. We provide efficient software development solutions with optimal costs and convenient communication.

servicesList.title: Enterprise Blockchain application services
servicesList.description: We help you develop Blockchain technology for businesses in all fields.
servicesList.fullDescription: Blockchain technology can provide you with easy and secure transaction records, transparent and unchangeable. We provide comprehensive Blockchain solutions from consulting, development to deployment and maintenance.

servicesList.title: AI & Machine Learning services
servicesList.description: Apply artificial intelligence and machine learning to optimize business processes.
servicesList.fullDescription: We develop AI and Machine Learning solutions helping businesses automate processes, optimize operations and make smart decisions. From natural language processing to computer vision and forecasting.

servicesList.title: DevOps services
servicesList.description: Optimize software development and operation processes with DevOps.
servicesList.fullDescription: We provide comprehensive DevOps services helping businesses automate software development, integration and deployment processes. Accelerate product release speed and ensure quality.

aboutSection.heading: Thank you for customer trust
aboutSection.subheading: Our journey is built on trust and cooperation from global partners, delivering excellent technology solutions and superior customer experience.
aboutSection.title: Your reliable technology partner
aboutSection.description1: HITEK is a leading technology company in Vietnam, specializing in providing software solutions and digital transformation services. With an experienced team of experts and advanced technology, we commit to delivering high-quality products.
aboutSection.description2: Our mission is to drive creativity, accelerate innovation, partner for development and elevate success for every business.
aboutSection.ctaDescription: Let us help you realize your ideas with optimal technology solutions

stats.experienceDesc: Many years of experience have given us extensive knowledge about many industries, allowing us to provide the best digital experience solutions.
stats.clientsDesc: Over 80 global clients from around the world, including Korea, Japan, Canada, Australia and many others.
stats.projectsDesc: Completed projects for customers, delivering superior digital transformation experience and optimal solutions.
stats.teamDesc: Talented team including digital experts, strategic thinkers, designers and creative developers.
